00014 #ifndef xrubythreadH
00015 #define xrubythreadH
00016 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00017 #include "xnode.h"
00018 
00019 extern "C" {
00020 #include <ruby.h>
00021 }
00022 
00023 #define RUBY_THREAD_ACTION_KILL "kill"
00024 #define RUBY_THREAD_ACTION_WAKEUP "wakeup"
00025 #define RUBY_THREAD_ACTION_FAILURE "failure"
00026 #define RUBY_THREAD_ACTION_STARTING "starting"
00027 
00028 #define RUBY_THREAD_STATUS_RUN "run"
00029 #define RUBY_THREAD_STATUS_SLEEP "sleep"
00030 #define RUBY_THREAD_STATUS_ABORTING "aborting"
00031 #define RUBY_THREAD_STATUS_STARTING "starting"
00032 #define RUBY_THREAD_STATUS_N_A ""
00033 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00034 //! XRubyThread object is a communicator for Ruby thread.
00035 //! \sa XRubySupport
00036 class XRubyThread : public XNode
00037 {
00038     XNODE_OBJECT
00039 protected:
00040     XRubyThread(const char *name, bool runtime, const XString &filename);
00041 public:
00042     virtual ~XRubyThread() {}
00043 
00044     bool isRunning() const;
00045     bool isAlive() const;
00046     void kill();
00047     void resume();
00048   
00049     XTalker<shared_ptr<XString> > &onMessageOut() {return m_tlkOnMessageOut;}
00050     //! def. input gets(). Return "" if the buffer is empty.
00051     XString gets();
00052     const shared_ptr<XStringNode> &lineinput() const {return m_lineinput;}
00053 
00054     const shared_ptr<XStringNode> &status() const {return m_status;}
00055     const shared_ptr<XStringNode> &filename() const {return m_filename;}
00056 //  shared_ptr<XStringNode> &action() const {return m_action;}
00057     const shared_ptr<XIntNode> &threadID() const {return m_threadID;}
00058 private:
00059     XTalker<shared_ptr<XString> > m_tlkOnMessageOut;
00060     const shared_ptr<XStringNode> m_filename;
00061     shared_ptr<XStringNode> m_status;
00062     shared_ptr<XStringNode> m_action;
00063     shared_ptr<XStringNode> m_lineinput;
00064     shared_ptr<XIntNode> m_threadID;
00065     shared_ptr<XListener> m_lsnOnLineChanged;
00066     void onLineChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &);
00067     std::deque<XString> m_lineBuffer;
00068     XMutex m_lineBufferMutex;
00069 };
00070 
00071 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00072 #endif
